about_the_game:
Welcome to Wallbound



About:

You are a Test Subject, trapped in Chamber 7, with little chance of escape. You will have to dodge past all the obstacles that are in your way if you would like a chance to escape. You will be provided with some tools to aid you in your journey. You will receive: A grappling gun to swing past the enemies, A Pistol so you can defeat anyone who opposes you, and lastly, the ability to parkor. This skill will be crucial to your success, as you will have to run on walls, slide under obstacles, and sprint through rooms, while you are being fired at. Good Luck, and don't die.


Features:

  • Wall Running
  • Sprinting
  • Climbing
  • Grappling and Swinging
  • Shooting
  • Sliding
  • And Much More
detailed_description:
Welcome to Wallbound



About:

You are a Test Subject, trapped in Chamber 7, with little chance of escape. You will have to dodge past all the obstacles that are in your way if you would like a chance to escape. You will be provided with some tools to aid you in your journey. You will receive: A grappling gun to swing past the enemies, A Pistol so you can defeat anyone who opposes you, and lastly, the ability to parkor. This skill will be crucial to your success, as you will have to run on walls, slide under obstacles, and sprint through rooms, while you are being fired at. Good Luck, and don't die.


Features:

  • Wall Running
  • Sprinting
  • Climbing
  • Grappling and Swinging

name: The Backrooms: Together

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements not final

short_description: Welcome to The Backrooms, 600 Million square miles of the sent of musty carpet, and yellow florescent lighting. Venture with up to 20 of your friends into the vast expanse of the backrooms.
